name: portchecker
description: Portchecker.io is a self-hosted utility tool for testing open ports on IPs or domains. It offers a minimal UI and HTTP API for verifying if services are reachable.
features: Port scanning: Test if specific ports are open on IP addresses or domain names.
Multiple protocols: Check TCP and UDP ports for various service types.
Batch checking: Test multiple ports simultaneously for efficient network diagnostics.
Web interface: Simple web UI for entering targets and viewing results.
API access: Programmatically check ports using HTTP API for automation and monitoring.
Response time: Measure connection response times to identify network latency.
Service detection: Identify common services running on open ports.
History tracking: View previous port check results for comparison and monitoring.
Custom timeouts: Configure connection timeout values for different network conditions.
IP and domain support: Check ports on both IP addresses and domain names.
Result export: Export port check results in JSON or CSV format for analysis.
Lightweight tool: Minimal resource usage makes it suitable for running on low-power devices.
